Text: Files in the torrent don't match the description.  There are 5 MKV's instead of 2 AVI's.  Also, the resolution in the description isn't even close to 720p, not even 540p!  Anyone completed the download and can confirm quality?
Will the forum be coming up?

Thank you soooo much for the hard work .... Unlike other people i dont care how they are filed... i dont care how they are descripted ... i dont care how many files are on there... and i really dont care about the quality ! ... i would rather watch the BBC coverage in Black and white than have to put up with Fucking Speed's Crap shite pile of wank that they put out every race ! ....
THANK YOU AGAIN SO MUCH FOR ALL THE HARD WORK ....
